About me

I'm Koliada Oleksii

Hi all! My name is Oleksii, I am a front-end developer from Ukraine. I am currently living in France and studying at a local high school. I started to learn how to build sites when I was 14 years old (it was my first websites on builders like Tilda and Wordpress, and I was more into design and marketing than development). But at 17, I started with the basics of HTML and CSS. Then I moved on to JavaScript and delving into frontend development.

Web-Development
I started learning real code on March 14, 2022. I feel free to show my code on githab. No one is born with talent, everyone was a beginner.
4 Languages
My Skills in Languages: Емодзи at the B1 level. Емодзи at the A1 level. Укра Русс Every three months I take a language test.
Web-Design
I used to work as a designer and I still have a sense of taste and style. All my projects can be found on Behance.

Skills

What I use in my work
HTML5
There probably isn't a person who doesn't know what HTML is. HTML stands for HyperText Markup Language. It is a markup language that is used to create web pages
CSS3 + SASS + SCSS
CSS3 is the third version of the cascading style sheet language that allows developers to change the appearance of elements on the page
Java Script
This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, getting data from the server, and more
Jquery
Jquery library will speed up development. We will not integrate it into the project unnecessarily, but the skill of working with it is present
React
React is developed and supported by Facebook, Instagram, and a community of individual developers and corporations. It is used to develop single-page and mobile applications
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - "brains" that will perform actions that the user does not see
Mongo.db
This is a non-relational database that will store your website or application data
